resources.string:
A vanilla option is an agreement that gives an investor the right to buy (Call) or sell (Put) a stock at a specified price (Strike) at a specified time (Expiry).
 Parameters

SPOT - Spot: the current price of the underlying

STR - Strike: the strike price of the option

RATE - Interest Rate: the riskless interest rate

DIV - Dividend Rate: the dividend rate

VOL - Volatility: the volatility

EXP - Expiry: the time to expiration (expressed in years)

Greeks

Delta: sensitivity to the underlying

Gamma: sensitivity of delta to the underlying

Theta: sensitivity to time

Speed: sensitivity of gamma to the underlying

Vega: sensitivity to volatility

Rho: sensitivity to the riskless interest rate

A digital (binary) call (put) pays 1 if at expiry the asset price is greater (less) than the strike. 
 Parameters

SPOT - Spot: the current price of the underlying

STR - Strike: the strike price of the option

RATE - Interest Rate: the riskless interest rate

DIV - Dividend Rate: the dividend rate

VOL - Volatility: the volatility

EXP - Expiry: the time to expiration (expressed in years)

Greeks

Delta: sensitivity to the underlying

Gamma: sensitivity of delta to the underlying

Theta: sensitivity to time

Speed: sensitivity of gamma to the underlying

Vega: sensitivity to volatility

Rho: sensitivity to the riskless interest rate

Barrier option are path-dependent options. Out options pay off if a barrier is not reached. In options pay off if a barrier is reached. If the barrier is above (below) the initial asset value, we have a up (down) option. The pay-offs are call or put. Sometimes a Rebate is paid if the barrier level is reached.
 Parameters

SPOT - Spot: the current price of the underlying

STR - Strike: the strike price of the option

RATE - Interest Rate: the riskless interest rate

DIV - Dividend Rate: the dividend rate

VOL - Volatility: the volatility

EXP - Expiry: the time to expiration (expressed in years)

BAR - Barrier: the barrier level

REB - Rebate: if the barrier level is reached, it pays a Rebate price

Greeks

Delta: sensitivity to the underlying

Gamma: sensitivity of delta to the underlying

Theta: sensitivity to time

Speed: sensitivity of gamma to the underlying

Vega: sensitivity to volatility

Rho: sensitivity to the riskless interest rate

Greeks

Delta: sensitivity to the underlying

Gamma: sensitivity of delta to the underlying

Theta: sensitivity to time

Speed: sensitivity of gamma to the underlying

Vega: sensitivity to volatility

Rho: sensitivity to the riskless interest rate
